org.sql: SELECT mentions.status_id FROM mentions WHERE mentions.silent = "$1" AND mentions.status_id IN ("$2", "$3", "$4", "$5", "$6", "$7", "$8") AND mentions.account_id = "$9"

rewrites.sql: SELECT mentions.status_id FROM mentions WHERE mentions.silent = "$1" AND mentions.status_id IN ("$2", "$3", "$4", "$5", "$6", "$7", "$8") AND mentions.account_id = "$9" LIMIT 1
